title: NPSTAR: Nonpoint Source Transport and Reduction Model (Demo Reproducibility Package)

creators.name: Liu, Guowangchen
creators.affiliation: State Key Laboratory of Regional Environmental and Sustainability Science, Beijing Normal University

creators.name: Gao, Yuan
creators.affiliation: State Key Laboratory of Regional Environmental and Sustainability Science, Beijing Normal University

creators.name: Chen, Lei
creators.affiliation: State Key Laboratory of Regional Environmental and Sustainability Science, Beijing Normal University

description: This repository contains the open-source reproducibility package for the NPSTAR (Nonpoint Source Transport and Reduction) model. The package includes demonstration code, example datasets, and documentation for running a simplified total nitrogen (TN) simulation in small agricultural catchments. It supports full reproducibility and transparency following AGU and Water Resources Research open science requirements.
notes: This package is a simplified demo for reproducibility purposes. Full-resolution data and long-term simulations are available upon request from the corresponding author.
